name: Astral Angles
description: The year is 30XX, and the war of dimensions ended 4 days ago. The 2-Dimensionals have recently finished construction of a temporary 3-D base in their home territory, and a 3rd-Dimensional Ambassador is visiting for discussions over a peace treaty. Eventually, the 2-Dimensionals tempers grow paper-thin as they realize they cannot connect on any of the same points as their 3-Dimensional counterparts. The war begins anew, and you, being the 3-Dimensional being you are, are tasked with flying the ambassador out of the 2-Dimensional territory!!
